title: Programming
desc: Programming is a creative task: there is no right or wrong way to solve a problem, in the same way, that there is no right or wrong way to paint a picture.

title: Psychology
desc: Psychology is the study of the mind and behavior, according to the American Psychological Association. It is the study of the mind, how it works, and how it affects behavior.

title: Sport
desc: Sport is commonly defined as an athletic activity that involves a degree of competition, such as netball or basketball.
